name: cardinal
description: Syntax highlights JavaScript code with ANSI colors to be printed to the terminal.

scripts.test: npm run run-test && npm run lint
scripts.demo: node examples/highlight-string.js; node examples/highlight-self; node examples/highlight-self-hide-semicolons;
